name: Two Minutes To Sunrise
description:
She had a nightmare.
All her teddy bears had started a revolution and they were everywhere!

She woke up in a panic... and decided she wanted revenge.

She went back to sleep, and with the power of lucid dreaming, she sought to take back control of her dreams

controls:

W S A D + LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

weapons:

broom

book

pillow

wand

don't use pillow as weapon... Just run baby run

my first game jam. Made this game under 40 hours.

have fun.
